name: Girl Shoot!
description:
I am making honeyselect, koikatsu, ai shouju and scenes/commission requests as well as simple characters without modding! I also make small indie video games

My video games here will be free for everyone! But If you would like to support my work and help me keep on making video games, please visit my patreon or pixiv fanbox page and subscribe! Any amount helps!

https://ckuriyama.fanbox.cc/

If you want to request for a commission, please contact me at kevinso2001@gmail.com so we can discuss details! 😁

This is the Newest Version of my original prototype shooter game! I have made several significant changes to the point that the game is now very different from the original prototype that it can be called a new game in itself!

The original prototype will stay as it is, but this one will be updated as I learn more stuff!

Thanks!
